item.title: CSX因工业需求疲软、煤炭运输量下降而未达季度业绩预期
item.description: CSX周四公布的第四季度营收和利润低于市场预期，因工业需求疲软及出口煤炭量下降抵消了价格上涨和多式联运量增长带来的收益。【原文：CSX on Thursday reported fourth-quarter revenue and profit that fell short of market expectations, as weaker industrial demand ​and lower export coal volumes offset pricing gains ‌and stronger intermodal traffic.】

item.title: 新上市的ETF追踪最受散户投资者青睐的美国股票
item.description: Defiance ETFs与Futurum Equities周四联合宣布，共同推出一款新型交易所交易基金，旨在为个人投资者提供股票投资渠道。该基金聚焦于两家公司认为最受个人投资者青睐的股票——这一群体在美国股市中的影响力正日益增强。【原文：Defiance ETFs and Futurum Equities have jointly launched a new exchange-traded fund aimed ‌at providing exposure to stocks that they believe are of greatest interest to individual investors, a group that is an increasingly significant force in the U.S. stock market, the two firms said Thursday.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空对燃油成本和经济风险作出谨慎预测
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空周四预测，受季节性因素、燃油价格波动及经济不确定性影响，其第一季度亏损将超出预期，全年盈利前景亦低于华尔街预期。【原文：Alaska Airlines on Thursday ​forecast a wider-than-expected first-quarter loss and a full-year profit outlook below Wall Street estimates, citing seasonality, ‌fuel-price volatility and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 交易日：万岁！"TACO"交易
item.description: 周四全球股市大幅上涨，因美国总统特朗普就格陵兰岛达成协议框架，并撤回对多个欧洲国家加征关税的威胁，同时投资者对美国强劲的经济数据表示欢迎。【原文：World stocks leaped on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump agreed a framework of a deal on Greenland and withdrew his threat to slap new tariffs on several European nations, while investors also cheered upbeat U.S. economic data.】

item.title: 直觉外科公司因手术机器人需求强劲，季度业绩超预期
item.description: 直觉外科公司周四公布的第四季度利润和营收超出华尔街预期，这得益于其用于微创手术的机器人需求持续增长。【原文：Intuitive Surgical on Thursday beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit and revenue on growing demand for ​its surgical robots used in minimally invasive procedures.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称亚马逊计划下周再裁数千名企业员工
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，亚马逊计划下周启动第二轮裁员，作为其削减约3万名企业员工的更广泛目标的一部分。【原文：Amazon is planning a second round of job cuts next week as part of its broader goal of trimming some 30,000 corporate workers, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米·戴蒙2025年薪酬将升至4300万美元
item.description: 摩根大通周四表示，其长期首席执行官杰米·戴蒙2025年的薪酬方案上涨约10%，达到4300万美元。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said on Thursday its longtime CEO Jamie Dimon's 2025 pay package climbed about 10% to $43 million.】

item.title: 约翰迪尔首席财务官约书亚·杰普森将加入霍尼韦尔航空航天部门
item.description: 农业设备制造商迪尔公司周四在提交的文件中宣布，其首席财务官约书亚·杰普森将于2月19日正式离职。【原文：Farm equipment maker Deere & Co's chief financial officer, Joshua Jepsen, will resign from the position effective February 19, the company said in a filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 微软365服务中断，数千用户受影响，Downdetector数据显示
item.description: 据故障追踪网站Downdetector.com显示，微软生产力软件套件于周四出现故障，影响数千名用户。【原文：Microsoft's suite of productivity software was down for thousands of users on Thursday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 英特尔预测第一季度销售额和利润低于预期
item.description: 英特尔周四公布的季度营收和利润预期低于市场预期，因其正努力满足人工智能数据中心对传统服务器芯片激增的需求。【原文：Intel forecast first-quarter revenue and ​profit below market estimates on Thursday, as it struggles to match supply to booming demand ‌for traditional server chips used in artificial intelligence data centers.】

item.title: 日本央行料维持利率不变，因大选与收益率飙升蒙上前景阴影
item.description: 日本央行将于周五维持利率不变，并谨慎乐观地表示经济将保持温和复苏态势，这将为进一步提高目前仍处于低位的借贷成本提供依据。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to keep interest rates steady on Friday and signal cautious optimism that the economy will maintain a moderate recovery that would justify raising still-low borrowing costs further.】

item.title: 特朗普购买抵押贷款支持债券对住房成本影响甚微
item.description: 迄今为止，尚无充分证据表明美国总统唐纳德·特朗普通过购买抵押贷款支持债券来降低住房成本的举措已取得预期效果。即便该政策产生了一定成效，特朗普政府引发的广泛地缘政治焦虑仍可能导致借贷成本随时间推移而上升。【原文：There's scant evidence so far that U.S. President Donald Trump's bid to make housing more affordable by purchasing mortgage-backed bonds has had its desired effect, and to the extent it ​has, broader geopolitical anxieties driven by his administration look set to make borrowing more expensive over time.】

item.title: Magnum指控前Ben & Jerry's董事会主席存在"严重不当行为"，更多董事遭挤出
item.description: 本杰瑞冰淇淋公司为捍卫其进步使命而与母公司抗争多年，本周冲突升级。其母公司Magnum冰淇淋公司指控该品牌前董事会主席行为不当，并称其原有八人董事会现已缩减至仅两名董事。【原文：Ben & Jerry’s years‑long struggle to defend its progressive mission from parent‑company pressure escalated this week, as The Magnum Ice Cream Company accused the brand’s former board chair of misconduct and said its once eight‑member board had been reduced to just two directors.】

item.title: 欧盟可能重启美欧贸易协定批准程序，梅特索拉表示
item.description: 欧洲议会议长周四表示，在特朗普总统收回对格陵兰岛收购计划的关税威胁后，欧盟很可能重启与美国的贸易协定谈判。【原文：The European Union will likely resume work on a trade deal with the United States after U.S. President Donald Trump took back a tariff threat over his attempt to acquire Greenland, the European Parliament's president said on Thursday.】

item.title: 露露柠檬在投诉引发下架后，重新上线健身系列"Get Low"
item.description: 露露乐蒙运动服饰公司周四表示，其近期推出的"Get Low"健身系列已恢复线上销售。此前因用户投诉，该公司上周曾将该系列从官网下架。【原文：Lululemon Athletica said on Thursday it had resumed the online sales of its recently launched "Get Low" workout line, after ​the company pulled the collection down from its website last ‌week following user complaints.】

item.title: BNSF警告称冬季风暴将导致美国中部铁路走廊交通瘫痪
item.description: 伯克希尔·哈撒韦旗下BNSF铁路公司周四表示，一场冬季风暴将导致主要运输走廊的运营中断，暴雪、强风和极端低温正威胁着列车运行。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway -owned BNSF Railway on Thursday said a winter storm will disrupt operations across major corridors, as heavy snow, high winds and extreme cold threaten train movement.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称壳牌考虑退出阿根廷瓦卡穆尔塔页岩油田开发项目
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，石油巨头壳牌正考虑出售其在阿根廷瓦卡穆尔塔页岩油田的资产，并已于近几周接触潜在买家以探询其意向。【原文：Oil major Shell is considering a sale of its assets in Argentina's Vaca Muerta shale play and has approached potential buyers in recent weeks to gauge their interest, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 安永的泰格兰表示，企业必须投资于真实的人才能从人工智能中获益。
item.description: 安永全球副主席朱莉·泰格兰周四对路透社表示，除非企业投资于真实的人员并重新设计工作方式，否则无法从人工智能中获得生产力提升。【原文：Companies will not get productivity gains from artificial intelligence unless they invest in real people and redesign how work is done, Julie Teigland, EY's global vice chair, told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司为福特、通用汽车设立工业银行扫清障碍
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司周四宣布，已批准福特汽车公司和通用汽车公司的存款保险申请，为这两家汽车制造商设立工业银行并开始提供部分金融服务扫清了障碍。【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation announced Thursday that it had approved deposit insurance applications from Ford Motor Company and General Motors Company, clearing the way for the auto manufacturers to establish industrial banks and begin providing some financial services.】

item.title: 北方信托利润攀升，市场反弹推升手续费收入，股价创历史新高
item.description: 北方信托周四公布，受市场反弹推动资产价值上升，提振手续费收入，第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：Northern Trust on Thursday reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit as a market rally ​lifted asset values, boosting fee income.】

item.title: 美国航空公司发布旅行豁免政策，因冬季风暴"蕨"恐将引发大范围航班中断
item.description: 美国多家航空公司已推出全面旅行豁免政策，因冬季风暴"蕨"预计将给二十余个州带来大雪、雨夹雪和危险结冰天气，可能导致本周末前美国广大地区航空运输中断。【原文：U.S. airlines have rolled out sweeping travel waivers as Winter Storm Fern, forecast to spread heavy snow, sleet and dangerous ice across two dozen states, threatened to disrupt air travel across a wide swath of the country heading into the weekend.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻报道，奈飞首席内容官萨兰多斯将出席参议院听证会，就华纳并购案作证。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，网飞联合首席执行官泰德·萨兰多斯计划于2月在美国参议院委员会听证会上作证，该听证会将审查网飞以827亿美元收购华纳兄弟探索公司流媒体及影视制作业务的提案。【原文：Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos plans to testify in February at a U.S. Senate committee hearing examining the company's proposed $82.7 billion purchase of the streaming and studio operations of Warner Bros Discovery , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在奥斯汀启动无人驾驶出租车服务，无需安全员随车监督
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克周四表示，该公司已在奥斯汀启动无人驾驶出租车服务，且车内不配备安全监督员。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Thursday that the company has started Robotaxi rides in Austin without safety monitors in the car.】

item.title: 独家：北欧大型投资者重新评估美国投资敞口，因地缘政治风险加剧
item.description: 北欧大型投资者正日益警惕地审视持有美国资产的地缘政治风险，养老基金负责人向路透社透露，这标志着全球最大金融市场正面临日益扩大的撤资浪潮。【原文：Big Northern European investors are increasingly wary of the risks of holding U.S. assets in the face of geopolitical tensions, pensions chiefs told Reuters, ​a sign of a broadening shift away from the world's biggest financial market.】

item.title: 加密货币托管公司BitGo在纽交所上市首日股价飙升，估值达25.9亿美元
item.description: 加密货币托管公司BitGo周四在纽约证券交易所首次公开发行时，其股价开盘大涨24.6%，公司估值达到约25.9亿美元。【原文：Crypto custody firm BitGo was valued at ​about $2.59 billion after its shares ‌opened 24.6% higher in their New York Stock Exchange debut on Thursday.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克的X平台短暂停运后恢复，Downdetector数据显示
item.description: 据Downdetector.com网站显示，社交媒体平台X于周四短暂中断服务后已恢复运行，此前全球数千名用户曾遭遇服务中断。【原文：Social media platform X was back up after a brief outage for thousands of users globally on Thursday, according to Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 欧盟的维尔库宁表示，法治使其成为可靠的投资伙伴
item.description: 欧盟负责技术主权、安全和民主事务的官员周四表示，鉴于世界其他地区存在诸多不确定性，欧洲的法治和可靠性对投资该大陆至关重要。【原文：Europe's rule of law and reliability are critical to the case for investing in the continent given uncertainties in other parts of the world, the EU official responsible for tech sovereignty, security and democracy said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国总统特朗普起诉摩根大通，该银行表示
item.description: 美国最大贷款机构摩根大通周四在一份声明中表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普已就所谓"断银"指控对该公司提起诉讼。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has filed a lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase on accusations of debanking, the largest U.S. lender said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，美国银行和花旗集团正考虑推出年利率10%的新信用卡。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，美国银行和花旗集团正考虑推出利率为10%的新信用卡，以满足特朗普总统的要求。【原文：Bank of America and Citigroup are considering options to ​offer new credit cards with an interest rate of ‌10% to satisfy President Donald Trump's demands, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储及其他四家央行如何应对政治压力
item.description: 中央银行的独立性——即不受政治压力影响而自主设定利率的能力——被普遍视为国家经济福祉的关键所在。这也正是唐纳德·特朗普总统试图解雇美联储理事丽莎·库克一事引发如此广泛关注的原因之一。【原文：Central bank independence - the ability to set interest rates free from political pressure - is widely seen as critical to a nation's economic wellbeing, and it's one reason why President Donald Trump's attempt to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook is drawing so much attention.】
